welcome_message_body: Welcome to Shaoxing, a city known for its picturesque waterways, historic architecture, and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy your time here and explore all the charm this beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hangzhou Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Hangzhou Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
